title: STARTUP EXPO : FROM VISION TO VENTURE
shortDescription: The Startup Expo beckons young innovators to unveil their visions before a panel of seasoned experts and investors. It's your gateway to funding, recognition, and turning ideas into prosperous realities.
details: The Startup Expo is a premier platform designed to bridge the gap between visionary student startups and the professional investment ecosystem[cite: 86, 173]. Participants get the unique opportunity to exhibit their products, network with industry leaders, and pitch directly to angel investors and venture capitalists for potential seed funding[cite: 173, 176]. It is a celebration of innovation where ideas are transformed into scalable business models[cite: 87, 174].

title: ENTROPY : GIVE WINGS TO IDEAS
shortDescription: Entropy, a distinguished event tailored for aspiring entrepreneurs and students serves as a platform to glean wisdom from industry experts, motivational luminaries and accomplished entrepreneurs.
details: Entropy serves as a massive knowledge-sharing symposium featuring keynote sessions from some of India‚Äôs most successful entrepreneurs and motivational speakers[cite: 91]. The event is designed to inspire the next generation of leaders by providing deep insights into the challenges and triumphs of the entrepreneurial journey, offering students a chance to learn directly from the experts who have pioneered change in their respective fields[cite: 91].

title: UTHKRISHTI : SILENT HEROES OF TODAY
shortDescription: A transformative event that embodies the spirit of optimism and the pursuit of innovative rural and social startups with a profound commitment to driving positive change in society.
details: Uthkrishti is a unique flagship event dedicated to social and rural entrepreneurship[cite: 95]. It focuses on identifying and supporting silent heroes‚Äîinnovators who are developing sustainable solutions for grassroots problems[cite: 95]. The event provides a stage for startups that prioritize social impact over pure profit, helping them find the mentorship and resources needed to drive positive change in society[cite: 95].

title: IGNITION : SPARKS OF ENTREPRENEURIAL
shortDescription: A Business Model competition poised to bridge the gap between innovative entrepreneurs and visionary investors, aiming to foster growth and innovation for emerging businesses in India.
details: Ignition is a high-stakes Business Model competition poised to bridge the gap between innovative entrepreneurs and visionary investors[cite: 102]. Participants are required to present comprehensive business plans aimed at fostering growth and innovation for emerging businesses in India[cite: 103]. Judged by a panel of seasoned experts, this event acts as a catalyst for emerging businesses, providing them with the professional feedback and exposure required to thrive.

title: BUSINESS CASE STUDY : RESURRECT AND CORRECT
shortDescription: A battle of brains where students showcase their business acumen by addressing real-world problem statements with meticulously evaluated approaches.
details: The Business Case Study event is a battle of brains where students showcase their business acumen[cite: 108]. Participants are presented with a real-world problem statement, and their approach to addressing the challenge is meticulously evaluated[cite: 109]. It is an intense test of analytical thinking, quick decision-making, and financial literacy.

title: E MUN : IDEAS AND DIPLOMACY
shortDescription: A groundbreaking event set to redefine diplomacy and innovation, blending an exceptional UN simulation with the spirit of entrepreneurship.
details: The Entre Model United Nations (E-MUN) is a groundbreaking event set to redefine diplomacy and innovation[cite: 113]. Participants step into the shoes of global leaders and represent nations in an exceptional UN simulation that blends diplomacy with entrepreneurship[cite: 114]. It challenges participants to think about how global policy and entrepreneurship can solve the world's most pressing issues.

title: E-GATHERING : FUN EVENT
shortDescription: A captivating cultural night featuring emerging stand-up comedians, top-notch musicians, and talented performers to create an atmosphere of delight.
details: E-Gathering is a captivating cultural night that ushers in an atmosphere of delight for students[cite: 121]. The event features emerging stand-up comedians, top-notch musicians, and talented performers[cite: 122, 123]. It serves as an event focused on rejoicing the E-Summit and bringing a dose of mental peace and dopamine[cite: 134].

title: B-QUIZ : CHANNELIZE YOUR GREY MATTER
shortDescription: A brain-teasing quizzing event where teams engage in a battle of wits to test their business knowledge, risk-taking mindset, and analytical skills.
details: B-Quiz is a brain-teasing quizzing event where teams engage in a battle of wits[cite: 126]. It tests participants' business knowledge, risk-taking mindset, and analytical skills[cite: 126]. Teams compete through multiple rounds of high-intensity questioning, making it one of the most intellectually stimulating events of the summit.

title: CRICNOMETRICA : THE ULTIMATE CRICKET BATTLEGROUND
shortDescription: An exhilarating cricket-themed auction event that offers participants a unique blend of cricket expertise and practical insight into the art of bidding.
details: Cricnometrica is an exhilarating cricket-themed auction event that offers participants a unique blend of cricket expertise and practical insight into the art of bidding[cite: 130]. Participants can immerse themselves in the dynamics of a cricket auction, using strategy and analysis to build their ultimate team[cite: 130]. It is the ultimate cricket battleground for budding managers and enthusiasts.
